Description:
Detects MSI package installation from suspicious locations

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: MSI Installation From Suspicious Locations
Query: sourcetype='windows-application' eql select * from _source_ where ((provider_name = 'msiinstaller' and (eventid = '1040' or eventid = '1042') and (data like '%:\windows\temp\%' or data like '%\\\\%' or data like '%\desktop\%' or data like '%\perflogs\%' or data like '%\users\public\%')) and  not (data like '%c:\windows\temp\updhealthtools.msi%' or data like '%\appdata\local\temp\winget\%'))
